title: Nightfall
description: &lt;p&gt;According to&lt;em&gt;The Nice and Accurate Prophecies of Agnes Nutter&lt;/em&gt;,&lt;em&gt;Witch&lt;/em&gt;&#40;the world's only&lt;em&gt;completely&lt;/em&gt;accurate book of prophecies, written in 1655, before she exploded&#41;, the world will end on a Saturday. Next Saturday, in fact. Just before dinner.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;So the armies of Good and Evil are amassing, Atlantis is rising, frogs are falling, tempers are flaring. Everything appears to be going according to Divine Plan. Except a somewhat fussy angel and a fast-living demon—both of whom have lived amongst Earth's mortals since The Beginning and have grown rather fond of the lifestyle—are not actually looking forward to the coming Rapture.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;And someone seems to have misplaced the Antichrist . . .&lt;/p&gt;
